text: Idar-Oberstein is a town in Birkenfeld in Rhineland-Palatinate, Germany. About 30,000 people lived there. Idar-Oberstein is known as a gemstone and garrison town. It is also the largest town in the Hunsr√ºck. Actor Bruce Willis was born here. == Twin towns == Idar-Oberstein is twinned with: * Achicourt, France * Les Mureaux, France * Margate, England, United Kingdom * Turnov, Czech Republic == References == == Other websites == *
title: Idar-Oberstein
